snippet: Germany’s Jonas Hector slid an unremarkable shot under Gianluigi Buffon, the star Italian goalkeeper, to end a cautious, grueling game....
abstract: Germany defeats Italy, 6-5, on penalty kicks after 1-1 draw to advance to European Championship semifinals.
lead_paragraph: Germany’s Jonas Hector slid an unremarkable shot under Gianluigi Buffon, the star Italian goalkeeper, to end a cautious, grueling game.

headline.print_headline: Germany Defeats Italy in Shootout Because the Rules Require a Winner
headline.main: Germany Defeats Italy in Shootout Because the Rules Require a Winner
headline.content_kicker: Germany 1, Italy 1 | Germany wins on penalty kicks, 6-5 | European Championships Quarterfinals
headline.kicker: Germany 1, Italy 1 | Germany wins on penalty kicks, 6-5 | European Championships Quarterfinals
